Html:
So does this tool allow me to copy a Windows 7 ISO file (mycustomimage.iso) to a USB flash drive or to DVD media and then make the media bootable so that the ISO file on the media is accessed and Setup will run just as if I had inserted the Logo'd media from Microsoft?  This is the impression I get from the brief description.

Secondly, in the cases of USB Flash Drives which are not capable of being made bootable using Diskpart, will this tool succeed in making those bootable?

Thanks...
